title: design forward: sharing dialog
body:
some thoughts on how to improve sharing which @mtrichards and i discussed. @mtgap what do you think? we should collaborate on that soon to make sharing more awesome.

share dialog in general
* input field should have suggestions directly, maybe use chosen.js
* more padding, bigger in general, better grouping (iâ€™ll do that ;)
* show name, â»can editâ« and â»can shareâ« and x directly (edit & share default on)
* line up detail crud dropdown as list with â»can editâ«, default all selected
* in the future user images on the left of each row

![img_1609](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/925062/844356/ef8669f4-f3d0-11e2-83d9-c919e3ed9b7f.jpg)

share via email
* currently goes through share with link, too cumbersome
* should be integrated in the one field on top: â»share with user or emailâ«
* show email in list like username matt@example.com, only action is x
* future: generate unique link per email address so revocation on a per-person basis is possible

![img_1610](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/925062/844357/efa489e8-f3d0-11e2-95e0-8d2124f0af8f.jpg)
-- separation here --

share link
* rename from â»share public linkâ«
* input box next to label
* â»password protectâ« slightly indented maybe, or group it somehow

-- separation here --
![img_1611](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/925062/844358/efb79eb6-f3d0-11e2-8fb0-654addfa7e2f.jpg)

expiration date
* ability to set date _and_ time (only granular to hours)
* make impossible to choose date in past, minimum 1 hour in future
* show countdown as feedback (only granular to hours)
* admin ability to set default expiration time (default: expiration completely disabled)


more thoughts?
